title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
**GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers, 18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers**

Transform your living space with our luxurious GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers. This set of 2 soft cushion covers is designed to elevate the aesthetic appeal of your couch, sofa, bed, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or car.

**Product Details:**

- **Material:** Crafted from 100% velvet, these pillow covers offer a premium feel and a rich look.
- **Texture:** The soft and comfortable texture of these covers adds an element of cozy luxury to your space.
- **Color:** The stunning gold color of these covers is sure to grab attention and make a statement.
- **Dimensions/Size:** Measuring 18 x 18 inches (45 x 45 cm), these pillow covers are the perfect size for most standard cushions.
- **Insert Compatibility/Suitable Insert Size:** These covers are tailored to fit 18 x 18 inch or 20 x 20 inch inserts, ensuring a snug and neat fit.
- **Closure Type:** The invisible zipper closure guarantees a seamless look, while the zipper length of longer than 35cm makes inserting and removing cushions a breeze.
- **Usage:** Versatile in nature, these pillow covers are suitable for use in a variety of settings, including living rooms, bedrooms, chairs, window seats, coffee shops, offices, and even cars.
- **Washing Instructions:** These pillow covers are machine washable for your convenience. Simply wash in cold water and dry on a low temperature setting.
- **Customer Support:** We value your feedback. If you have any suggestions or improvements, please feel free to contact us.

Upgrade your decor with our GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers and enjoy the perfect blend of style and comfort.
